CSSBorder-block-start.summary: The border-block-start CSS property is a shorthand property for setting the individual logical block-start border property values in a single place in the style sheet.

remarks.para:
-CSS Logical Properties and Values
-This property maps to one of the physical border properties: border-top, border-right, border-bottom, or border-left.
-writing-mode, direction, text-orientation
